title: Calories in a Jolly Rancher
meta_description: Learn calories in a jolly rancher: about 24 kcal per piece, with carbs, sugars, and full nutrition details for this hard candy treat.
assumptions: Standard fruit-flavored hard candy piece, ~3.8 g, no wrappers or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size. Check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Jolly Rancher provides ~24 kcal, primarily from 6 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Jolly Rancher with 1 tsp caramel drizzle

faqs.q: How many calories in a jolly rancher?
What are the carbs in one Jolly Rancher?
faqs.a: About 6 g total carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Jolly Rancher have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's nearly all sugar-based carbs.

faqs.q: How many Jolly Ranchers equal 100 calories?
faqs.a: Roughly 4 pieces, since each has ~24 kcal.
